original_text: Then they left the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer dishonor for the name.
korean_text: 사도들은 그 이름을 위하여 능욕 받는 일에 합당한 자로 여기심을 기뻐하면서 공회 앞을 떠나니라

sentences.original_text: Then they left the presence of the council,
rejoicing that they were counted worthy
to suffer dishonor for the name.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 이름을 위해 불명예를 당하는 것을.
